data.title: Massachusetts Institute Of Technology
data.meta_description: 07.05 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Department of Mathematics at MIT had an exceptional year, aggressively hiring top faculty like James McKernan and Paul Seidel. Associate professors Martin Bazant and Alexander Postnikov received tenure, while three junior faculty resigned. The department seeks to improve its ranking through recruiting and serving students. It reached its $15 million fundraising goal to support faculty and graduate students. There were 119 graduate students and 284 undergraduate majors in mathematics.
